name: Freakout : TV Calamity Show
description: Freakout : TV Calamity Show is a juicy Top-Down-Dual-Stick-Shooter ! Where you embody a hero who will be fighting insane ennemies and who will be helped by a crazy rebelion ! The gameplay is rough and intense, inspired by old school arcade games and more recent Die & Retry shooters. Solo game, the story's starting point is inside a TV Reality Show, taking place in a dystopian disturbed mutant universe !
